knimeNode.name: RaSetOperation
knimeNode.shortDescription: Combine two tables using a selected set operation.

fullDescription.intro: Combine two tables using a selected set operation. Duplicates if any are removed from the output.
fullDescription.option: Keeps rows in the first table that do not occur in the second.
Keeps only rows that occur in the both tables.
Keeps only rows that occur in one table or the other but not both.
